TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Globals extends System.Object

summary.span: 模組包含指令碼引擎函式。

span.span: The module contains script engine functions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個模組支援的 Visual Basic 語言關鍵字和執行階段程式庫成員，提供目前使用中的執行階段的相關資訊。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and runtime library members that provide information about the runtime currently in use. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`ScriptEngineMajorVersion`屬性和相關的屬性，以傳回字串，描述目前的執行階段資訊：The following example uses the `ScriptEngineMajorVersion` property and related properties to return a string describing the current runtime information: ``` Function getRuntimeInfo() As String Dim runtime As String = ScriptEngine & " Version " runtime &= CStr(ScriptEngineMajorVersion) & "." runtime &= CStr(ScriptEngineMinorVersion) & "." runtime &= CStr(ScriptEngineBuildVersion) ' Return the current runtime information. Return runtime End Function ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ScriptEngine As String
public: static property System::String ^ ScriptEngine { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 傳回表示現用執行階段的 。

span.span: Returns a representing the runtime currently in use.

value.span: 傳回表示現用執行階段的 。

span.span: Returns a representing the runtime currently in use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ScriptEngine`屬性會傳回字串"VB"。The `ScriptEngine` property returns the string "VB". 您可以使用`ScriptEngine`作為獨立程式，在指令碼，或在主應用程式中執行您的應用程式時。You can use `ScriptEngine` when your application is running as a standalone program, in a script, or in a host application. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`ScriptEngine`屬性和相關的屬性，以傳回字串，描述目前的執行階段資訊：The following example uses the `ScriptEngine` property and related properties to return a string describing the current run-time information: [!code-vb[VbVbalrScriptEngineProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrScriptEngineProperties/VB/Module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ScriptEngineBuildVersion As Integer
public: static property int ScriptEngineBuildVersion { int get(); };

summary.span: 傳回包含現用執行階段組建版本號碼的 。

span.span: Returns an containing the build version number of the runtime currently in use.

value.span: 傳回包含現用執行階段組建版本號碼的 。

span.span: Returns an containing the build version number of the runtime currently in use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的值直接對應到目前的執行階段的 DLL 中包含的版本資訊。The returned value corresponds directly to the version information contained in the DLL for the current runtime. 您可以使用`ScriptEngineBuildVersion`作為獨立程式，在指令碼，或在主應用程式中執行您的應用程式時。You can use `ScriptEngineBuildVersion` when your application is running as a standalone program, in a script, or in a host application. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`ScriptEngineBuildVersion`屬性和相關的屬性，以傳回字串，描述目前的執行階段資訊：The following example uses the `ScriptEngineBuildVersion` property and related properties to return a string describing the current run-time information: [!code-vb[VbVbalrScriptEngineProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrScriptEngineProperties/VB/Module1.vb#1)]
